title: trolling player
body:
how games trolling does it take for people to get banned?
i have played with one multiple times tonight and its obvious that this person is trolling 51 cs and afk for 10 mins just moving with a click here and there why do we bother playing ranked when there is so many people doing this and why is there no perma bans for this behavior in ranked?{{champion:17}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body:
I get that crap happening too. 
So far not one person whos done that has been banned. Despite when i've reported them
It's a joke you can feed and int all you like with no repercussions but as soon as you throw a bit of bm their way you get reported by them and you get a punishment while they get nothing.
